Reviews.Title: “Above Average Below Premium”
Reviews.Author: Suresh75
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 2 nights stay except glitches clean sections 2 toilets 1 bathroom 2 televisions lot furniture required total 7 wooden chairs sit look carefully crash bathroom provide shaving kit tooth brush paste etc apart regular soap shampoo airconditioners setting wasnt able changed set 19 cold day 22 morning 19 ready chilling cold experience stay locality walk shopping water taxis etc staff allowed late checkout break fast reasonable priced reasonable valet parking single driver manage job parking manage front hotel expect delays patient day wait 30 minutes leave picking vehicle feel except minor issues value money hotel ready manage yourself

Reviews.Content: prefer hotel location low price compared facilities comfort walking distance station rigga 10 aed city center heart bur dubai distance cost saved dubai nicely decorated personally carpeting cool calm atmosphere aware changes outside clock depressed taking tea tea bag cups water swimming pool enjoy gym facility food specially breakfast service satisfactory level faced little bit discouraging reception service satisfaction
